definition: free and unfettered
leisurely/easy-going
distant/remote/far/far away
unfettered and beyond the law (idiom); evading retribution/getting away with it (e.g. crimes)/still at large
free and at leisure (idiom); unfettered/outside the reach of the law (of criminal)/at large
doing as one pleases (idiom); foot-loose and fancy free

sentences.english: In Pas-de-Calais the French lifestyle is better.
sentences.chinese: 加萊海峽省的法式生活才更逍遙。

sentences.english: Dancing shakes, his voice is high, the carnival night is yours.
sentences.chinese: 舞姿搖搖，嗓門高高，狂歡夜任你逍遙。

sentences.english: Fluttering red smile, only for the drunk.
sentences.chinese: 隨風飄搖紅塵一笑，只爲醉逍遙。

sentences.english: Bloody life not regret, I have drunk the free world of mortals.
sentences.chinese: 染血一生終不悔，紅塵逍遙我獨醉。

sentences.english: Dammit sir, it's your duty to get married. You can't be always living for pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 該死，先生，結婚是你的職責，你不能總是逍遙快活。

sentences.english: Nor is there any question that al-Qaeda is at large in Diyala.
sentences.chinese: 基地組織在迪亞拉逍遙法外也是毫無疑問的。

sentences.english: The outside world, evil is good, than to go home happy .
sentences.chinese: 外面世界千般好，不如回家樂逍遙。

sentences.english: If ability with this whereabouts matter, the whole life is happy to allow free and unfettered.
sentences.chinese: 若能以此去處事，一生安樂任逍遙。

sentences.english: Hundreds of those convicts remain at large.
sentences.chinese: 數以百計的逃犯仍逍遙法外。

sentences.english: He was a happy-go-lucky kid, he just didn't care about his responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 他是個逍遙派，他一點也不在乎責任這種東西。

sentences.english: You're enjoying yourself now, but a day of reckoning will come.
sentences.chinese: 別看你現在逍遙，將來會遭報應的。

sentences.english: We stood in silence watching the fish glide effortlessly.
sentences.chinese: 我們靜靜地站着，看着魚兒逍遙自在地游來游去。

sentences.english: The  escaped prisoner is still at large.
Can LuoShanShan will kill murderer at large?
sentences.chinese: 能將殺死羅珊珊的兇手逍遙法外嗎？

sentences.english: You are Xiaoyao pill because of irregular menstruation you eat this?
sentences.chinese: 你是因爲月經不調喫這個逍遙丸的嗎？

sentences.english: Joyride topped the US chart in spring 1991.
sentences.chinese: 專輯《逍遙遊》於1991年春榮登美國排行榜榜首。

definition: confident and at ease/free and easy
alone/independent/single/sole/only
enclosure/(variant of 閒|闲[xian2]) idle/unoccupied/leisure
to go easy/unhurried/calm/Taiwan pr. [cong1 rong2]
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to fulfill one's desire/to find sth satisfactory
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
muddy/to mix
this mortal life/the mundane world
to pay no attention to/to disregard/to ignore/to let go unpunished/to let off
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
Wuwei county in Chaohu 巢湖[Chao2 hu2], Anhui
the Daoist doctrine of inaction/let things take their own course/laissez-faire
surname Wei
to speak/to say/to name/to designate/meaning/sense
endless/inexhaustible
strength of character/vigorous style (of calligraphy)
